attributes.action: Stop the Government giving our medical details to private companies
attributes.additional_details:
Please stop the Government from giving our medical details to private companies.
We are entitled to our privacy.
There is nothing more private than an individuals health.
These companies have many ways of realising information other than having it from our GPs.
No information should be released without the individuals permission. No GP should have the authority to breach the confidentiality of a patient.
